_comments.slack_token: Direct Slack API token. Leave empty if using slack_token_source.
_comments.workspace_url: Your Slack workspace URL (e.g., https://mycompany.slack.com). Defaults to https://slack.com if not provided.
_comments.pagination_delay: Seconds to wait between pagination requests (helps avoid rate limits)
_comments.batch_fetch_users_channels: Batch fetch user/channel info upfront to reduce API calls (recommended: true)
_comments.max_api_retries: Number of retries for rate-limited API calls
